channel.title: Thoughts on Anbuselvan Palaniyandi
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Anbuselvan Palaniyandi

item.title: Project Mainline - Is Google trying to build Wall of Garden?
item.description:
Google introduced Project Mainline starting from Android 10. Google claims that project mainline benefits users on 3 components.

  1. Security
  2. Privacy
  3. Consistency

item.title: The Renascence
item.description: This has been very long time, since I stopped writing blogs. I started with blogger in 2008; was writing about my phases of life, learning, activities, people I missed/lost, poems, festival, tips, tricks, etc.,
